segments.text: Do you have any habits such as smoking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I rarely smoke . I don't drink , either . I only drink with my family on celebrations or with close friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of winter sport do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My favorite winter sport is skiing . In addition , I am keen on basketball .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you like doing in your spare time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like doing aerobics in my spare time . It's good for my health .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have . I collect stamps , Chinese stamps as well as those from other countries .
segments.speaker: S2
